attributes.action: give people from NI the means to have a say in the UK general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it stands we are governed by whichever PM is elected in a UK general election despite the fact that we cannot vote for either Conservative, Labour or Liberal Democrat.
I suggest that this makes the people of NI British subjects rather than British citizens given that our voice is not heard in such an important national matter. I demand equal rights for the Northern Irish people.
Even with devolution in place, our local budget is determined by Westminster and therefore I believe we deserve our say in who will determine our Local Assembly's ability to govern
